description: President-elect Joe Biden has also vowed that the US will respond to the attack.
title: SolarWinds Sunburst: UK data watchdog issues hack alert
title_page: SolarWinds Sunburst: UK data watchdog issues hack alert - BBC News
maintext: "In an interesting turn of events, the investigation of the whole SolarWinds compromise led to the discovery of an additional malware that also affects the SolarWinds Orion product but has been determined to be likely unrelated to this compromise and used by a different threat actor," it said in a blog published on Friday.
